meanings.definition: A passage or opening through which something is discharged, such as vomit or a crowd of people.
meanings.sent1: The vomitories in the stadium allowed the fans to enter quickly.
meanings.sent2: The vomitories were crowded with excited spectators after the game.
meanings.sent3: The vomitories at the concert were like busy ant tunnels.
meanings.sent4: The vomitories of people exiting the subway station resembled a flowing river.
meanings.sent5: The vomitories of the theater were like streams of eager viewers.

meanings.definition: A tunnel-like entrance or exit in an amphitheater or stadium.
meanings.sent1: The vomitories provided easy access to the stadium seats.
meanings.sent2: The crowd poured out of the vomitories after the event.
meanings.sent3: The vomitories looked like secret passageways to the field.
meanings.sent4: The vomitories acted as portals to the exciting game inside.
meanings.sent5: The vomitories resembled giant funnels guiding people in and out.
